author: Enrique Conde
title: El éxito de la FP dual, con más de 5.000 alumnos en Navarra, amenazado por los recortes en tutorías
text:
El Consejo Navarro de Formación Profesional repasó este miércoles las actuaciones llevadas a cabo en formación profesional continua y acreditación de competencias profesionales, además del “elevado” nivel de cumplimiento de las actuaciones llevadas a cabo con fondos MRR y el “éxito” de la progresiva implantación de la FP Dual, en la que participan más de 5.000 alumnos y alumnas de FP de Navarra formándose en empresas. El consejero Gimeno, que presidió el órgano, afirmó que “este Consejo tiene la responsabilidad y también la oportunidad de dar forma a una FP transformadora que responda de manera ágil a los cambios del entorno”.
CENTROS MOVILIZADOS
Sin embargo, el éxito de la FP Dual, que se extenderá a partir del próximo curso a alumnado de 1º que ya podrán realizar sus prácticas en empresas, se ve amenazado ahora según denuncian la mayoría de centros por la reducción de horas de tutorías (que bajan de 4 a 1). De hecho, la semana pasada, once de los 19 centros educativos que imparten estas enseñanzas se concentraron para mostrar su enfado y al menos otros dos lo hicieron en semanas anteriores.
A su juicio, la aplicación de este nuevo sistema de FP Dual “amenaza” con deteriorar la calidad de la enseñanza que se ofrece al alumnado. El motivo de este malestar se debe a la gestión del nuevo modelo de FP Dual que se ha comenzado a implementar este curso, coexistiendo con el antiguo sistema en los segundos cursos. Esta transición, explicaron en una nota, “ha supuesto una sobrecarga notable de trabajo para los equipos docentes, quienes se han visto obligados a gestionar convenios con empresas, realizar seguimientos formativos, tramitar cotizaciones a la Seguridad Social, y adaptar documentación normativa, todo ello sin un incremento proporcional de los recursos humanos.”
INDICADORES POSITIVOS
Sin embargo, de este malestar no consta ni línea en la nota informativa elaborada por Educación sobre el Consejo Navarro de FP. Solo se dice que en la elaboración de un plan de desarrollo de la FP Continua se busca la asunción por parte de los servicios existentes y pertinentes de Educación de las funciones derivadas de estas competencias, como pueden ser la gestión de la información derivada de la formación y la gestión del personal.
A partir del 1 de enero, todos los estudiantes de FP en Navarra comenzaron a formarse bajo el modelo dual desde el primer curso. Alrededor de 5.000 estudiantes ya estaban en prácticas durante 2024. “Los indicadores son muy positivos”, dijo Gimeno. “Alta empleabilidad, proyectos innovadores y una expansión constante de oferta y centros. El feedback de las empresas ha sido muy positivo, reconocen que en un principio tenían un poco de miedo a acoger alumnado de 1º, pero una vez que se han animado la experiencia les ha resultado positiva e incluso piden aumentar las horas de estancia”, indicó.
Desde el Departamento se está trabajando para establecer y reforzar esa relación con las empresas. A modo de ejemplo se han cerrado convenios marco con Salud, CEPEN, VW, Asociación Hostelería y Turismo de Navarra que participa en dual intensiva, y la Asociación Navarra de Talleres de Reparación de Vehículos y Concesionarios de Navarra que se adhiere al proyecto empresaDUALnavarra para participar en Dual intensiva como forma de cubrir las necesidades de personal del sector y de retener el talento.
Respecto a los procedimientos de acreditación de competencias profesionales por la vía de la experiencia y vías no formales de formación el Consejo ha sido informado de que de noviembre de 2024 a junio de 2025 se ha abordado e iniciado el proceso de admisión de 1.980 expedientes nuevos (871 de hombres, y 1.109 de mujeres), en 21 familias profesionales y 235 cualificaciones diferentes. Hasta el 19 de junio, se ha terminado la fase de asesoramiento de 1.488 expedientes (843 mujeres, 56,65 %), y la fase de evaluación de 1.504 expedientes (810 mujeres, 53,86 %). De ellos, en 1.485 expedientes se han acreditado competencias (98,21% de los expedientes evaluados).

author: Luiz Gustavo Rezende
title: Chuva forte é registrada em Uberaba nesta sexta e final de semana deve ter mais precipitações
text:
Chuva forte e volumosa é registrada em Uberaba na tarde desta sexta-feira (13), conforme dados cedidos pela climatologista Wanda Prata, foram 30 milímetros de chuva nas duas precipitações. Vídeos de diversos bairros sob forte tempestade foram enviados para o Jornal da Manhã, por meio do aplicativo de mensagens no número 9 9777-7900.
Apesar dos ventos fortes que acompanharam a chuva, o Corpo de Bombeiros não foi acionado para ocorrência durante o período da chuva. As precipitações com mais volume começaram por volta das 16h40.
No entanto, a chuva foi rápida em alguns bairros da cidade. A plataforma Climatempo previa que Uberaba teria 14 milímetros de chuva nesta sexta.
O fim de semana deverá ser chuvoso se as previsões de concretizarem. Para sábado, a previsão é de 30 milímetros de chuva e temperaturas amenas, com máxima de 27 graus.
Para domingo, o Climatempo prevê mais chuvas, com as precipitações podendo chegar a até 16 milímetros. As temperaturas máximas podem ser de 29 graus, um pouco mais quente que o dia anterior.

author: Loren Grush
title: Voo espacial da Blue Origin só com mulheres terá Katy Perry e noiva de Jeff Bezos
text:
Bloomberg — A estrela pop Katy Perry vai voar para o espaço ao lado da jornalista Gayle King e da noiva do bilionário Jeff Bezos, Lauren Sánchez, em um próximo voo do foguete turístico da Blue Origin, que terá apenas mulheres a bordo.
Em um post de blog na quinta-feira (27), a Blue Origin anunciou a próxima tripulação de seis pessoas de seu foguete New Shepard, que também inclui Kerianne Flynn - uma produtora - Aisha Bowe - uma ex-cientista da NASA e diretora executiva da STEMBoard - e Amanda Nguyen - uma cientista de pesquisa bioastronáutica e defensora de sobreviventes de violência sexual.
Leia também: Corrida espacial: SpaceX e Blue Origin impulsionam mercado de equipamentos
Sánchez anunciou pela primeira vez os planos de voar para o espaço no foguete New Shepard da Blue Origin com uma tripulação totalmente feminina em 2023, ao falar à revista Vogue. Na época, ela disse que todas as escolhidas eram notáveis e estavam “abrindo caminho para as mulheres”.
O foguete New Shepard da Blue Origin foi projetado para levar clientes pagantes até a borda do espaço em uma rápida experiência de ausência de gravidade em uma viagem de aproximadamente 11 minutos.
Veja mais em Bloomberg.com
Leia também: Blue Origin envia ‘Capitão Kirk’ para o espaço aos 90 anos
©2025 Bloomberg L.P.

author: FOX 8 Staff
title: One girl dead, one found alive; suspect arrested in Mississippi, TPSO says
text:
LORANGER, La. (WVUE) - UPDATE: The Tangipahoa Parish Sheriff’s Office reported the recovery of 4-year-old Erin Brunett’s body. Her 6-year-old sister, Jalie Brunett, was found alive and well. The suspect was arrested in Jackson, Mississippi.
According to the Tangipahoa Parish Sheriff’s Office, 35-year-old Callie Brunett was missing for over 24 hours before being found “brutally murdered” in her home at 56044 N. Cooper Road. Her death is being investigated as a homicide.
Tangipahoa Parish Sheriff's Office continues search for missing girls in Loranger Her two small children, 6-year-old Jalie and 4-year-old Erin are “unaccounted for,” Sheriff Daniel Edwards said in a 10:34 a.m. press release.
Erin is described as being approximately 3′ tall and weighing about 32 pounds. Jalie is described as being 4′ tall and weighing about 58 pounds. It is unknown what clothing the kids were wearing.
Louisiana State Police says the kids were abducted before 8 a.m. and issued an AMBER Alert at 12:28 p.m. In the alert, LSP says an unknown white male is wanted for questioning in a domestic violence incident that occurred at the time of the abduction and resulted in Brunett’s death. It is unclear what the man’s relation to the victim or the children is.
In a press conference Thursday afternoon, Chief Jimmy Travis says Brunett was reported missing Tuesday and because her car was not at her house, her family did not believe she was home. Thursday morning, her father made entry into her home and discovered her body and her children missing.
The manner of Brunett’s death was not disclosed, but Chief Travis said there was “blood everywhere.”
An AMBER Alert was issued at 12:28 p.m. on Thursday for Jalie and Erin Brunett, who were unaccounted for after their mother, 35-year-old Callie Brunett, was found "brutally murdered" in her Loranger home. (LSP) Detectives say Brunett’s car is also missing, described as a black 2012 Chrysler 200 with Louisiana license plate 859GML. There is no hubcap on the back right tire of the vehicle. Police say there may be damage to the rear of the vehicle.
LSP believes the man driving the vehicle is armed and dangerous. Detectives are asking anyone with information regarding their whereabouts to call 911 immediately.
Detectives say Callie Brunett's car is missing, described as a black 2012 Chrysler 200 with Louisiana license plate 859GML. (Tangipahoa Parish Sheriff's Office) Sheriff Edwards asks anyone with information regarding the whereabouts of the children or vehicle to contact Lt. Jacob Schwebel at 985-902-2037, or Crime Stoppers of Tangipahoa if you wish to remain anonymous. To submit an anonymous tip, call 1-800-554-5245.
See a spelling or grammar error in our story? Click Here to report it. Please include the headline.
Subscribe to the Fox 8 YouTube channel .

author: Times Now Digital
title: Jamie Ivey, Wife Of Fired Austin Pastor Aaron Ivey, Steps Away From Public Life | Times Now
text: After the Austin Stone Church in Austin, Texas, fired pastor Aaron Ivey on February 5, 2024, for allegedly sending 'explicit' messages to a teen and other men, his wife Jamie Ivey announced in a blog post recently that she is stepping away from public life. Jamie, who describes herself as a 'podcaster, speaker and writer,' wrote in a blog post that she is temporarily stepping away from public life. The statement released by the church mentioned that the abuse involved “predatory manipulation, sexual exploitation, and abuse of influence” with both adult males and a minor male. The statement added that since the allegations against Aaron Ivey surfaced, they have \"uncovered multiple similar instances with different individuals dating back to 2011 that show a very clear pattern of predatory manipulation, sexual exploitation, and abuse of influence.”In a blog post published on May 22 on her official website titled 'Important Update From Jamie' she said that she had been slowly pulling her herself away from public life after the allegations against Aaron surfaced and her was fired by the church three months ago. \"Over the past few weeks, I have tried to slowly begin returning to my public work commitments while continuing to heal privately, \" she wrote. \"I see now that it was too soon, and I apologize for any insensitivity, harm, or confusion this brought.\"Like all of you, I am profoundly grieved by Aaron's actions. The effect has been traumatic for the victims and, in a different way, myself and our family. I continue to deeply grieve all the pain he has caused so many people.\"As things have continued to unfold and be brought into the light, it is clear to me that I need more space and time to process. For now, I will be fully stepping away from my public life as a speaker, podcaster, and author to heal privately, listen, process, and discern the best way forward. I ask you all for grace as I attempt to navigate without a roadmap, a path that I did not choose.\"Musician Logan Garza alleged that he was one of the victims of sexual abuse by Aaron Ivey. Garza claimed that he was groomed from the age of 15 and sexually abused by Ivey from ages 16 to 20. The grooming involved making Garza feel special, exposing him to mature things like cigarettes and alcohol, and eventually coercing him into sexual acts.

organizations.name: steps away from public life | times now after the austin stone church
